original_text: and while my glory passes by I will put you in a cleft of the rock, and I will cover you with my hand until I have passed by.
korean_text: 내 영광이 지나갈 때에 내가 너를 반석 틈에 두고 내가 지나도록 내 손으로 너를 덮었다가

sentences.original_text: and while my glory passes by
I will put you in a cleft of the rock
and I will cover you with my hand
